definition: Edwin Hubble (1889-1953), US astronomer/Fritz Haber (1868-1934), German chemist
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]

pinyin: Ha1 bo2 Tai4 kong1 Wang4 yuan3 jing4

sentences.english: Harp and her husband, Nick, grow the giant gourds on their family farm.
sentences.chinese: 哈伯和她的丈夫尼克，在他們的家庭農場裏種大葫蘆。

sentences.english: Hubbard and Northrup ended up in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 哈伯德和貝蒂在洛杉磯分手了。

sentences.english: Reading and writing assessment Boca Raton, Habersham.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀和寫作評博卡拉頓哈伯舍姆。

sentences.english: Dianetics, Hubbard said, was a “precision science.”
sentences.chinese: 哈伯德說，戴尼提是一門“精確的科學”。

sentences.english: Again, what's the utility of the Born-Haber Cycle?
sentences.chinese: 波恩哈伯循環的作用是什麼？

sentences.english: The church denied this, and said that Hubbard’s income was generated by his book sales.
sentences.chinese: 山達基否認這一點，說哈伯德的收入是賣書所得。

sentences.english: Hubbard called this level the Wall of Fire.
sentences.chinese: 哈伯德把這一等級叫做烈焰之牆。

sentences.english: A brief comparison between Chillingworth and Ahab is made in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文試將齊林沃思與埃哈伯做一比較研究。

sentences.english: Once, a rich old man met Abernathy at a party.
sentences.chinese: 一次，一個富有的老傢伙在一次宴會上碰到哈伯瑪斯。

sentences.english: Harbert, the founder of American North West Airline, made such remarks.
sentences.chinese: 美國西北航空公司的締造者哈伯曾經如是說。

sentences.english: As a result, Hubble's crucial discovery of the expanding universe will become irreproducible.
sentences.chinese: 如此一來，哈伯關於宇宙膨脹的重要發現將無法重現。

sentences.english: Mr. Hubbard knew how devoted Mr. Varhola had been to his first wife.
sentences.chinese: 哈伯德先生知道喬治是如何的關心愛護他的前妻。

sentences.english: One day, Hubbard and Northrup ran off together.
sentences.chinese: 一天，哈伯德和貝蒂一起跑了。

sentences.english: Thou hast broken Rahab in pieces, as one that is slain;
sentences.chinese: 你打碎了拉哈伯似乎是已殺的人。

sentences.english: A teacher from Harborville's School for the Deaf.
sentences.chinese: 哈伯維爾聾人學校的一位老師。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
rad (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)
Hook or Hooke (name)/Robert Hooke (1635-1703), brilliant English experimental scientist and inventor
